node.title: Rare parcel of land in inner Sydney for sale, but there's a catch
node.alt: An aerial view of the  building site at Haberfield
node.description: A large parcel of land in a sought-after Sydney suburb is scheduled to go on sale after being stuck in a bureaucratic logjam for nearly two decades, but a local councillor says prospective buyers are "probably going to be disappointed".
node.content:
["A large parcel of land in a sought-after Sydney\u00a0suburb\u00a0is scheduled to go on sale after being stuck in a bureaucratic logjam for nearly two decades.", "The Department of Defence will put its old army base in Haberfield on sale by early next year, freeing up 19,000 square metres just 7 kilometres west of the CBD.", "Work is underway to divide the land\u00a0at 140A Hawthorne Parade into 21 lots that can be developed into residential homes, ranging in size from 500 to 1,048 square metres.", "Real estate agents value it between $40 million to $60 million.", "\"If you want a brand new house, close to the city, with privacy, a nice streetscape in a quality suburb, you won't get that opportunity anywhere,\" director of Elders Inner West Alfio Musumeci said.", "Haberfield is a federation suburb recognised by the National Trust of Australia.", "", "
Developments in Haberfield are bound by strict rules.(ABC News: Tony Ibrahim)
", "Haberfield is recognised as Australia's first \"garden suburb\", where\u00a0free-standing homes on generous blocks\u00a0are\u00a0fronted by nature strips and tree-lined streets.", "Strict development controls were introduced by the former Ashfield Council to preserve its character.", "\"You can't build a two-storey home in Haberfield,\" Inner West councillor Lucille McKenna said.", "\"It's very limited with what you can do.\"", "Council planning documents state: \"Residential buildings in Haberfield are uniformly single storey and of a similar bulk. They are built of a restricted range of building materials (bricks, slate or unglazed tiles) and are of a similar shape but individually designed.\"", "Haberfield's suburban charm, coupled with its proximity to the CBD, have seen values skyrocket.", "A new record was set two months ago when a four-bedroom home sold for more than $7 million, exceeding the reserve by $2 million.", "", "
The site has been vacant\u00a0since 1997.(Supplied: Inner West Council\u00a0)
", "The Department of Defence has been trying to sell the\u00a0base for 18 years, and the final regiment vacated the premises in 1997.", "Four years later, Defence was granted conditional approval by the former Ashfield Council to subdivide the land into 22 lots, including one that would be donated to the community.", "Auctioneer David Scholes officiated a sale in 2003.", "\"We had a large marquee [on the site] and people were spilling out,\" Mr Scholes said.", "\"I wouldn't be surprised if there were 200 to 300\u00a0people\".", "The hammer fell on all 21 properties, netting Defence $18.2 million.\u00a0The cheapest property sold for $742,000, with the most expensive fetching $1.15 million.", "But the sales never closed.", "", "
These large pipes are intended to manage water flow.(ABC News: Tony Ibrahim)
", "The Council wouldn't sign off on the sale because the land sat at the bottom of a hill that was susceptible to flash flooding.", "Attempts to proceed with the sale throughout the years stalled.", "Then earlier this year, Defence made its most determined effort to fix the issues by hiring experts and purchasing equipment.", "\"The works include general maintenance upgrades to the site and engineering works to address a storm water drainage system upgrade,\" a spokesperson said.", "", "
Established trees like these\u00a0are a feature of Haberfield.(ABC News: Tony Ibrahim)
", "Inner West Council documents reveal stricter conditions will have to be met, and \"the drainage upgrade [alone]\u00a0is estimated to cost a minimum of $2 million\".", "Last week, large pipes intended to manage water flow were delivered to the base.", "But if Defence is successful in subdividing the land, only 17 lots will go on sale.", "Four of the 21 original buyers have not asked for their deposit back since the auction in 2003 \u2014\u00a0and Defence said it would\u00a0honour the original contracts.", "The buyers secured their lots for between $742,000 and\u00a0$945,000.", "Industry experts estimate\u00a0land is worth two or three times more today.", "", "
There's only one entrance to the abandoned base.(ABC News: Tony Ibrahim)
", "Councillor McKenna said the buyers would only be able to build single-storey homes and they would\u00a0have to be off the ground to protect them from potential floods.", "\"They'll live in Haberfield \u2026 but when people put in an application to build, they're probably going to be disappointed,\" Ms McKenna said.", "The Inner West Council is holding a community briefing on the land's development on\u00a0November 18.", "The Department of Defence said a sale would be marketed in early 2022 \"once the titles have been issued\"."]
